Mod4_Description: If at least {c_number}{SF_12}{/c} enemies are Nearby when you cast {c_important}War Cry{/c}, your damage bonus is increased to {c_number}[({SF_1} + {SF_9}) *100|%x|]{/c}.
Mod5_Description: {c_important}War Cry{/c} grants you {c_number}[{SF_15}*100|%|]{/c} Base Life {c_number}([{fortified:MOD_FORTIFY_BASE}|0|]){/c} as {c_important}{u}Fortify{/u}{/c}.
desc:
{c_label}Cooldown:{/c_label} {c_resource}{Cooldown Time}{/c_resource} seconds
Bellow a mighty war cry, increasing your damage dealt by {c_number}[{SF_1}*100|1%x|]{/c} for {c_number}[{SF_2}|1|]{/c} seconds, and Nearby allies for {c_number}[{SF_5}|1|]{/c} seconds.
name: War Cry
simple_desc: Brawling Skill: Bellow a mighty war cry. Allies gain increased damage.
